title: Peter Faith
author: Peter Faith
content: This word opportunity eeeh e dey cause wahala for we society oh...most people wen opportunity reach their hand them dey take am do and undo their fellow human..wetin make I dey talk this thing..For my state something happen wey lead to stopping of Keke driving in the night and no much taxi,,buses so now the rate of transport fare at night no be here..where you go pay 150 normally for day time,,,now na 300 because say the few driver's wey dey available don see so many passengers on the road so now them don see opportunity to bill people anyhow they like without considering say this one na my fellow human being...all their own if you like you enter...if you like stay...Although no be only transportation,,so many other sectors too na the same over using of opportunity nai still dey go on...and we dey cry for change The thing dey borderðŸ¤¦ me I say make I share am with una

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: That one don be Normal thing Â For my country Naija. we dey always take advantage of any problem wey the economy dey face. Just like during the scacity of momey, you no see wetting happened to banks? The money wey CBN bring make them shear people from different banks the bank managers keep the money, dey shear am among POS Marchants. E Â come make the naira dey scars that time. we go go bank to collect money na problem. Highest Dem fit give you na 3k. Dem dey sell the note to only POS people. This na no tell you say the curruption dey everywhere because if financial institution no ft maintain there dignity by making everything equalibrum, that is to tell you say if the common man do desame I no go too blame them.the government wey we dey look up to don fail us naim they cause all this things. had it been the government dey produce public transportation with better price tag of transportation fee before them they put all this law e for better. But Dem dey put law without providing proffer solution to it. If you know the cost of 1 keke and how the youth dey manage to make money from am, you go know say e no easy for them too. Â No be say I dey support them, but I dey talk base on putting myself in their shoes, you go also know wetting dey make them do those things. Me I bellieve say wetting go cause that price hyke na that ban wey Dem place on tryciclis. And anywhere such thing they, e be like a forbidden zone, and anybody wey dey run am dey at risk and the price of the risk them take naim be the price increase.

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: I no go blame anybody about the situation wey we they inside now. That could be an opportunity in the sight of the transportation guys and for them it's there opportunity to move the market prices upward at a particular time. But as it is an opportunity for the transportation guys , it will not be to the travelers or commuters since as a passenger you're always looking for what's favourable to you and within your budget.This is where the government is supposed to come in, to ensure there is a proper checkmate of the rates and that such rates are standardised and monitored by the related regulatory bodies including that of private car owners. The same issue is what we face with commodities, because there's an increase in the exchange rate and fuel subsidy removal, prices of some commodities have skyrocketed and still increasing by the day and no government body is taking a leadership role towards salvaging the situation for the benefit of the average and poor Nigerians. We are indeed the architects of our own problems.

So with that anger the Ijaw youth burnt down the Keke instant and all the Abokis at the area ran away. And the governor heard the news so curfew was used to ban the Keke driving for Night so taxes took over the night movement.And according to taxi drivers the way Keke used to drink fuel is not the same way for Keke so they have to charge high to meet up the expenses.
